1.0.name: wordpress/wp-showtime
1.0.description:
The plugin is able to display on your blog movie showtimes for a given city, for 4 days, as there is a search string and the user can find your city. The plugin supports two languages, English and Russian (specified in settings).

Plugin their work uses a database service Google Movies

Demonstration of the plugin can be found at http://pro-kino.com/today-in-the-cinema/ Official website of the plugin on my site http://tsepelev.ru/wp-showtime
